alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 2:46AM CST until November 20 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations up to 1.0 inch at elevations above 6000 ft and ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch across the remainder of the advisory area. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Davis Mountains, Eastern Culberson, I- 10/I-20 split. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST /9 AM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In New Mexico, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432-4269. In Texas, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-9292.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains; Davis Mountains Foothills; Eastern Culberson County; Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
